Keir Starmer , the Director of Public Prosecutions, announced a comprehensive assessment of all material in the possession of the Metropolitan Police Service relating to phone hacking. The allegations concern the behaviour of journalists during the time that Mr Andy Coulson was editor of the newspaper.
